mapper.select: select ul.browser, ul.ip_addr, date_format(ul.login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS loginTime, u.user_name from aoa_user_login_record as ul join aoa_user as u on u.user_id = ul.user_id order by ul.login_time desc
